name: Rebirth (itch) (JHawk Studios)
description:
Throughout human history, one question has plagued all of humanity:

What comes after death?

*Intended to be played in 1:1 aspect ratio - WebGL version preferable

This is a short game about a tragic journey through death and the afterlife.  In the game, an unnamed character suffers what appears to be a stroke and is unable to recover. this leads him to be reborn inside his favorite video game which, conveniently is also about life and death.

Rebirth is about the sacrifice each bird is making to carry the adventure forward. Each time an egg is thrown, the previous bird comes to an end. But as we all know, an end of something great can be the beginning of something even better.

This game was made in a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1.

Controls:

Move  -  Arrow keys or  A  <->  D  

Jump -  Right Click (aim with cursor)

Respawn From last checkpoint - R

Next Dialogue (intro only) - Right click

Boss fight Help:

Stage 1: Lure a rocket into the body of the pigeon tank.

Stage 2: Hit the button on the body of the tank and avoid charge attacks.

Stage 3: Lure another rocket and avoid charge attacks.
